categories: Category:Sith acolytes and apprentices of the Sith Empire
Category:Sith of the resurgent Sith Empire

nodes.text: Maraad was a male member of the Sith species and a Sith who served the Sith Empire as an apprentice on the Sith capital planet of Dromund Kaas. He was stationed in a small camp near the planet's capital, Kaas City, alongside Captain Jeelg.
